text: Scouting for Girls are a British pop rock band formed in London in 2005 by Roy Stride, Greg Churchouse and Peter Ellard. Stride met Ellard at Cub Scouts and he then met Churchouse at school. In September 2007 Scouting for Girls released their first album Scouting for Girls. It was number one in the UK Albums Chart for two weeks. == Band members == Current members * Roy Stride - lead singing, guitar, keyboards (2005-present) * Greg Churchouse - bass, backing singing (2005-present) * Pete Ellard - drums, percussion (2005-present) Current touring members * Peter Clements - guitar * Matt Simmons - keyboards (2010-present) Session * Martin Owen - horn on Scouting For Girls (2007) * James McMillan - trumpet on Scouting For Girls (2007) Personnel * Andy Green - Producer of Scouting For Girls (2007) == Discography == * Scouting for Girls (2007) * Everybody Wants to Be on TV (2010) Category:2005 establishments in England Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:British pop rock bands Category:English pop music groups Category:English rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:Musical groups from London Category:Musical trios
title: Scouting for Girls
